name: RS Boxing Champions
summary: Fight alongside 100 million+ fans of Real Steel World Robot Boxing in an epic sequel. Build Your Own Robot Champion and Dominate 10 inspiring Arenas. Create 1000s of unique robots from exclusive and legendary robot parts. Defeat the Legends of the New Real Steel Era & an All-New Mysterious Super Boss to Reign Supreme as The Undisputable Champion!

name: R-Space
summary: R-Space is a fast-paced first-person shooting game that supports up to 4 people online. Players need to survive round after round of trials, continuously strengthen their abilities, and challenge higher rounds.

name: R-Shark
summary: R-Shark is a space themed Shoot 'Em Up developed and published by Dooyong in Korea for the Arcade platform. Many of Dooyongs arcade games were exported to Japan, but R-Shark was their first to only be released in Korea.

name: RS3: Racing Simulation Three
summary: Racing Simulation 3 is a Sim racing video game of the racing genre. There are 16 racing courses that the player can race on. A different feature besides the improved AI drivers. It also has six different game procedures, from driving school to championship cups.

name: R_sin
summary: R_sin is a third-person single-player adventure horror game that combines shooting elements with horror elements.

name: RSDKv4 Decompilation
summary: A decompilation for Sonic 1 & 2 (the remastered versions), making them playable on computers, since the original releases were only for mobile platforms. The mod also comes with a built-in mod loader.

name: RSSU: Retro Style Soviet Undies
summary: RSSU - Retro Style Soviet Undies is an adult visual novel with a unique story, made in pinup style and filled with humor, sex and romance. Go back to the 80s, meet beautiful Soviet women and discover the exciting mystery of the town of Maryino.
